document.full_text: tunisia's government ordered an overnight curfew on saturday after three days of forcefully suppressed protests and sacked an influential figure whose comments on a possible coup sparked the demonstrations.
document.title: tunisia declares curfew after renewed protests
lines_and_colors: tunisia's government ordered an overnight curfew on saturday after three days of forcefully suppressed protests and sacked an influential figure whose comments on a possible coup sparked the demonstrations.
